name: Ensoniq VFX-SD File
summary: An EFV file is a sound file used by the Ensoniq VFX-SD digital workstation synthesizer, a keyboard released in 1989. It stores MIDI -like data in the Ensoniq VFX-SD (EFV) sound format, which includes notes to be played, tempo and pitch settings, and other information related to playback on the Ensoniq VFX-SD device.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
